verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* \w leper|strong="H6879"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* suffereth \w a|strong="H0176"\w* running \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H6944"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* sanctified \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* healed. \w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* toucheth \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H6944"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w by|strong="H3605"\w* occasion \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w dead|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* goeth \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w him|strong="H2891"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* generation,

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* toucheth \w a|strong="H0176"\w* creeping \w thing|strong="H8318"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w thing|strong="H8318"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w touching|strong="H5060"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w defiling|strong="H2930"\w*,

\w Shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w those|strong="H0834"\w* \w things|strong="H6944"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* sanctified: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w with|strong="H7364"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*,

\w That|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H5038"\w* dieth \w of|strong="H3068"\w* itself, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H5038"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* taken \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* beast, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* therewith, \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* precepts, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* fall \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2399"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sanctuary, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* \w defiled|strong="H6942"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*. \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w No|strong="H3808"\w* stranger \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sanctified \w things|strong="H6944"\w*: \w a|strong="H3808"\w* \w sojourner|strong="H8453"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* \w hired|strong="H7916"\w* \w servant|strong="H7916"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H0398"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* whom \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* hath \w bought|strong="H7069"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* servant, \w born|strong="H3211"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* married \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H0376"\w*, \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w those|strong="H0376"\w* \w things|strong="H6944"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* sanctified, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* firstfruits.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w divorced|strong="H1644"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w having|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w children|strong="H2233"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* meats, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* wont \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* maid, \w no|strong="H3808"\w* stranger hath leave \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* eateth \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sanctified \w things|strong="H6944"\w* \w through|strong="H5921"\w* ignorance, \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w add|strong="H3254"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w part|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* which \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w ate|strong="H0398"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w To|strong="H5795"\w* \w be|strong="H1241"\w* offered by \w you|strong="H8549"\w*, it \w shall|strong="H5795"\w* \w be|strong="H1241"\w* \w a|strong="H2145"\w* \w male|strong="H2145"\w* \w without|strong="H8549"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w* \w of|strong="H7522"\w* \w the|strong="H1241"\w* beeves, \w or|strong="H1241"\w* \w of|strong="H7522"\w* \w the|strong="H1241"\w* \w sheep|strong="H3775"\w*, \w or|strong="H1241"\w* \w of|strong="H7522"\w* \w the|strong="H1241"\w* \w goats|strong="H5795"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w acceptable|strong="H7522"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0176"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* blind, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* scar \w or|strong="H0176"\w* blisters, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w scab|strong="H1618"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* dry scurf: \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* burn \w any|strong="H5414"\w* thing \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord’s|strong="H3068"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.
